newsitem.title: PHILIPPINES: Sime Darby declares 0.10 peso cash div.
newsitem.headline: Sime Darby declares 0.10 peso cash div.

text.p: The board of directors of Sime Darby Pilipinas Inc has declared a 0.10 peso cash dividend per share, a notice from the Philippine Stock Exchange said on Monday.
The cash dividend will be given to shareholders on record as of November 6. It will be payable on December 6.
The company paid a cash dividend of the same amount earlier this year. In 1995, its cash dividends totalled 0.30 peso in tranches of 0.10 peso.
Sime Darby Pilipinas, a unit of Sime Darby Hong Kong Ltd, has previously announced it will shift from tyre manufacturing to property development.
